name: Simple Idle 1
description:
A VERY simple idle game made in 1 day, You get 1 money per second at the start and have to purchase the 4 upgrade tiers with a prestige.

Prestiging gives you 1.5x of your current money multiplier (which is 1x at the start) and resets all your stats.

Cost of prestige: 1B (goes up by 2.5x when you buy it)

Upgrade starting costs (you can buy them multiple times and the costs become more expensive):

1. 10

2. 200

3. 20,000

4. 1M

What the upgrades do to your MPS (money per second): up1 x up2 x up3 x up4 = MPS

up = upgrade
